doc.field: Garrit S.K. Remsen accounts and collection records for Flatlands School District No.2
Garrit S.K. Remsen accounts and collection records for Flatlands School District No.2
Handwritten financial accounts and collection records for School District No. 2 in the town of Flatlands in Brooklyn, dated 1894-1895 and recorded by Collector Garrit S.K. Remsen.
Handwritten financial accounts and collection records for School District No. 2 in the town of Flatlands in Brooklyn, dated 1894-1895 and recorded by Collector Garrit S.K. Remsen.

Handwritten financial accounts and collection records for School District No. 2 in the town of Flatlands in Brooklyn, recorded by Collector Garrit (also spelled Garret) S.K. Remsen. The accounts date from 1894 and 1895.
Gift of Miss Augusta G. Smith, 1957.
